code: import*as httpRequest from"../utils/httpRequest";import Notification from"../components/Notification";const createResult=async data=>{try{return await httpRequest.post("result/create/",data,'"Content-Type": "application/json"');}catch(error){if(error.response.status===403){Notification(error.response.data.message,"error","/login");localStorage.removeItem("accessToken");};return error;}};const updateResult=async(data,id)=>{try{return await httpRequest.update("result/update/",data,id,true,'"Content-Type": "application/json"');}catch(error){if(error.response.status===403){Notification(error.response.data.message,"error","/login");localStorage.removeItem("accessToken");};return error;}};const getResult=async()=>{try{return await httpRequest.get("result/",{});}catch(error){return error;}};const deleteResult=async id=>{try{return await httpRequest.remote('result/delete',id);}catch(error){if(error.response.status===403){Notification(error.response.data.message,"error","/login");localStorage.removeItem("accessToken");};return error;}};export{createResult,getResult,updateResult,deleteResult};
